title: My Lp is screwed
body:
Riot i am having some issues with my Lp. First i had normal MMR and i was only gaining 14Lp and now its saying i get 14Lp but only giving me 11Lp
Riot plz i need help. The system is messing me up and i need this to be fixed. i cant climb like this. plz.

replies.body: no i ahd it when i was in B5 but then i climbed out and now the problem started to occur

I checked your account and it looks like you've been dodging a few times, resulting in a loss of LP and getting you into the negative values in LP (e.g. -3 LP, or -12 LP). Since the client has a hard time displaying negative LP values, it would explain why you believe your LP values aren't working right. I recommend avoiding a dodge while you're playing ranked matches, since they count against your LP.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
Did you have negative LP from dodging?  If you were at -3 LP that could explain it.
